configuration.markdownDescription: Settings that control the output of the copied content.

copyContext.template.markdownDescription:
**Markdown template** for text files. Available placeholders:

- `{path}` – the file’s relative path
- `{content}` – the file contents

**Example:**
```json
"// {path}\n{content}"
```
copyContext.template.title: Markdown Template

configuration.title: Output

configuration.markdownDescription: Settings that control the filtering of the files.

copyContext.excludeGlobs.markdownDescription: **Always exclude** these glob patterns (highest priority). Even if they match your include list, they will be skipped.
copyContext.excludeGlobs.title: Exclude Globs

copyContext.includeGlobs.markdownDescription: **Always include** these glob patterns, overriding Explorer or gitignore exclusions.
copyContext.includeGlobs.title: Include Globs

copyContext.maxContentSize.markdownDescription: Maximum total size **in bytes** of all file contents to copy. Prevents dumping very large files into your prompt.
copyContext.maxContentSize.title: Max Content Size

copyContext.respectGitIgnore.markdownDescription: When **true**, skips files matching your project’s `.gitignore` (opt-in).
copyContext.respectGitIgnore.title: Respect .gitignore

copyContext.respectVSCodeExplorerExclude.markdownDescription: When **true**, skips files/folders hidden in the VS Code Explorer (respects your `files.exclude`).
copyContext.respectVSCodeExplorerExclude.title: Respect VSCode Explorer Excludes

configuration.title: Filter

copyContext.enableAnalytics.markdownDescription: Help improve the extension by sending **anonymous** usage statistics.
copyContext.enableAnalytics.title: Enable Analytics

description: Copies selected files/folders as Markdown code context or structure
name: copy-code-context
